name: Hunt With Friends
description:
„Hunt with Friends“ is an online multiplayer hunt game. An open world and many different animals are a symbol of the first game from GamePixelStudios. You can explore a beautiful landscape alone or with your friends.

You are spawning in a dynamic world full of animals. Hunting is your target to get coins by which you can buy new items in the shop. Of cause, diverse animals inhabit the forest, whether shy deer or aggressive bears
The game includes a small quest System, a journey [some information about weapons and animals] and of cause different weapons and tools. For example, you can switch between a powerful Revolver or a long-range Sniper rifle, just to name some weapons.
You can hunt Everything! On a PvP Map you can hunt your friends to find out, who will be the next King of the Forest. And in case you’re sweating, you can just switch to a Snow Map.

Have fun and enjoy.

Sincerely,
Your GamePixelStudios Team
